attributes.action: Widen the proposed new police powers to stop and question anyone they like.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The proposed new police powers should be widened to include the right of the general public to stop and question any member of Her Majesty's Government in the hope of uncovering anything more worthy than a half baked, oppressive, police state measure, built upon the promotion of fear.  

Failure to cooperate should be punished with public demonstrations by suspected ministers of their ability to find their backside with both hands.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
